title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message:
Battery only charges while on pin 4 of j6950 fluctuates from 1.4v to 2.2v

dont know where to start..

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: Check pull up resistor, water damage around BIL connector, unplug BIL, water damage around battery connector, if you are measuring with DMM, voltage should fluctuate between 3.4V to 2.9, never seen go lower than that, on a working LB of course....

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: BIL connector was unplugged no noticable water damage around the area. Battery connector does have some white residue but nothing looks badly damaged and resistors have proper measurements. Using a fluke 15B+ to measure and the board works.

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: diode mode on both data lines from battery connector??

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message:
Data lines would be smbus_chgr_scl and smbus_chgr_sda? If so.

smbus_chgr_scl=461
smbus_chgr_sda=480

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: Both lines should be about the same and voltage should be 3.4V on both lines (because of the pull up resistors), could be a bad ISL or a bad SMC......

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: Does the BIL work? Is orange light present? PPBUS voltage without battery?

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message:
hi duke so the BIL works and now its charging while off and BIL connected. did this fix itself or is this a known design which bill has to be connected for it to charge? im confused.

update : spoke too soon is just randomly stops charging and Bil stopped working as well. it will work for a short period after connecting power only.

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: Does it keep working with BIL disconnected? BIL could have corrosion in it messing up the data lines that also go to the battery.

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message:
No doesnt work either way. It has suddenly stopped charging while off again.

would eradicating the bill connector rid the issue?

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: No idea, if it has crap under it. But that would also mess up PPBUS and that should drop to 12.3V without battery. Check when it does not want to charge what PPBUS voltage is with battery disconnected.

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message:
12.26v without battery
12.55 with battery.
once again its charging like normal and has not stopped for a longer period.

removed charger and reconnected ppbus stays at 12.58v but no orange light with battery still plugged in.

unplugged charger again and reconnected charge indication is back. now this time i get 12.36v on ppbus hmm..

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: 12.26V on battery! What is that indicating?

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message:
now its 11.77v on ppbus with battery connected no charge indication and BIL cable connected on ppbus.
12.62v with BIL disconnected no charge indication while battery connected on ppbus.
11.85 without Bil connected, charger unplugged and battery connected on ppbus.

12.28v without battery connected and BIL unplugged and plugged in on ppbus.

when leaving everything plugged in and reconnecting battery i get 12.30v on ppbus

just noticed it randomly start charging for a little bit then orange light turned back off voltage on ppbus went to 12.06v with everything plugged in.

ok so left the battery charger plugged in while battery was on 85% even though it had no orange light the battery went up to 98% could this thing be charging with indicator problems?

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: Communication from SMC to ISL seems intermittent. Could be crap under BIL connector, around ISL or under SMC. Charging works fine without BIL connected of course so leave that off to rule out that is causing issues.

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: decided to just leave BIL unconnected and its been functioning fine. ill leave as is.

title: 820-2530 wont charge when turned off
message: Now the system will not sleep when you close the lid!
